mode.notes: 42 Australian animals. Reversal toggles Clear/Storm. One Element Overlay modifies timing + tone.

overlays.name: Wind
overlays.effect: Information moves fast. External voices amplify. Verify, simplify, choose your signal.

overlays.name: Rain
overlays.effect: Emotions wash through. Grief can move. Heal gently, restore the ground.

overlays.name: Thunder
overlays.effect: A test is forming. Prepare structure and stance. Don’t wait for impact to decide.

overlays.name: Lightning
overlays.effect: Truth arrives fast. The window is short. Act cleanly and decisively.

overlays.name: Fire
overlays.effect: Purification by heat. Cut what’s false. Enforce the boundary; protect the core.

overlays.name: Fog
overlays.effect: Visibility is low. Delay commitments. Observe patterns until clarity returns.

overlays.name: Drought
overlays.effect: Resources are limited. Reduce inputs. Ration effort. Survive the season wisely.

overlays.name: Tide
overlays.effect: What returns must be met correctly. Timing rules everything. Expect recurrence.

suits.name: Threshold
suits.domain: Boundaries, consent, access, terms of approach.

suits.name: Trace
suits.domain: Patterns, evidence, history, the returning lesson.

suits.name: Motion
suits.domain: Action, restraint, momentum, the right moment.

suits.name: Sovereign
suits.domain: Autonomy, self-law, chosen belonging, unowned choice.

cards.title: The First Boundary Bites
cards.clear: You feel the edge before you can name it. Bull Ant arrives as a small, undeniable truth: something is too close. Your body is wiser than your politeness.
cards.storm: You’re letting people step on you, then calling it patience. Or you’re snapping at shadows because you’ve been ignored too long.
when: Your nervous system tightens for ‘no reason’
cards.boundary_note: A clean sting now prevents a wound later.
cards.key_message: Protect the gate while it’s still a gate.

overlays.TIDE: This boundary will return; set it right.

cards.title: Respect the Unseen Line
cards.essence: Respect the line you cannot see.
cards.clear: This is not fear—this is precision. Brown Snake teaches: don’t reach where you haven’t looked. Move slowly. Confirm the ground.
cards.storm: You’re walking into risk because you want to prove you’re fine. Or you’re calling everything dangerous to avoid intimacy.
when: Trust is being demanded, not earned
You must choose caution without panic
cards.boundary_note: Distance is wisdom when the pattern is unknown.

overlays.RAIN: Let fear wash out; keep rules.

cards.title: Power Decides Entry
cards.clear: Cassowary is sovereign force: calm until crossed. It does not argue for its boundary. It simply is the boundary.
cards.storm: You’re using intimidation where clarity would work. Or you’re shrinking because you forgot your size.
cards.boundary_note: A boundary is not a debate club.

cards.title: The Hidden Contract
cards.clear: Funnel-web reminds you: some dangers are quiet. The trap is not the web—it’s the assumption. Read the fine print. Test the tone.
cards.storm: You’re stuck in a sticky agreement and calling it loyalty. Or you’re suspicious of everything and letting nothing live.
when: You need to verify before committing
cards.boundary_note: If it must be hidden, it isn’t clean.

cards.title: Ancient Law at the Waterline
cards.clear: Crocodile is the hard edge that keeps you alive. It teaches timing and consequence: some places are not yours to wander.
cards.storm: You’re over-controlling because you don’t trust life. Or you’re reckless because you’re numb.
when: Near a point of no return
cards.boundary_note: Power without rule becomes hunger.

cards.title: The Ordinary Disguises the Sting
cards.clear: Stonefish appears when danger hides in plain sight. Not everything sharp looks sharp. You must trust subtle warning signals.
cards.storm: You’re stepping on the same pain again because you refuse to look down. Or you’re seeing threat everywhere because you’re tired.
cards.boundary_note: Don’t touch what you haven’t truly seen.

cards.title: Glow and Be Untouched
cards.clear: This is the sacred ‘no’ with elegance. The rings say: I will not be handled. Your boundary is allowed to be luminous.
cards.storm: You’re using allure to trap others, or letting allure trap you.
when: You must enforce a boundary without apology
Learning to be untouchable when needed
cards.boundary_note: The brightest signal is often the boundary.

cards.title: The First Tunnel
cards.clear: Wombat begins where others overlook. It teaches: build your foundation underground—quiet, strong, enduring.
cards.storm: You’re hiding when you should be building. Or building without leaving airholes for joy.
cards.boundary_note: Build safe shelter, not a prison.

cards.title: The Return of the Rare
cards.clear: Bilby says: your path may be fragile, but it’s real. Protect the thing that doesn’t thrive in crowds.
cards.storm: You’re abandoning your rare truth for convenience. Or you’re clinging to rarity as identity.
cards.boundary_note: Guard the tender track.
cards.key_message: Protect what is rare in you.

cards.title: The Paradox Track
cards.clear: Platypus teaches: reality doesn’t owe you simplicity. Follow what’s true even if it doesn’t match categories.
cards.storm: Confusion becomes an excuse. Or you over-explain the miracle until it dies.
cards.boundary_note: Let strange truth remain true.
cards.key_message: Trust the odd shape of reality.

cards.title: The Slow Inheritance
cards.clear: Koala is the memory of the body: routines, safety, familiarity. It appears when you must honor your pace.
cards.storm: You’re stuck in comfort that is slowly starving you. Or rejecting stability because you confuse it with prison.
cards.boundary_note: Comfort must feed you, not numb you.

cards.title: The Armored Lesson
cards.clear: Thorny Devil is the living receipt. Every spine is a past boundary learned. Learn once, and encode it.
cards.storm: You’re spiking everyone because you’re still hurt. Or shedding protection too soon.
cards.boundary_note: Armor is for truth, not for vengeance.
cards.key_message: Let your scars become maps, not weapons.

cards.title: The Display of Warning
cards.clear: The frill is not vanity—it’s signal. This card appears when your boundary must be visible to prevent escalation.
cards.storm: You’re performing threat without real action. Or you’re staying silent until you explode.
cards.boundary_note: Signal early to avoid damage.
cards.key_message: Show the boundary before you need the bite.

cards.title: Truth Consumes Illusion
cards.clear: Tasmanian Devil appears when denial is over. It brings raw reality, cleansing by confrontation.
cards.storm: Rage is driving you. Or you’re feeding on chaos because it feels like power.
cards.boundary_note: Let truth eat lies, not your life.

cards.title: Echo Becomes Voice
cards.essence: The first true imitation becomes art.
cards.clear: Lyrebird says: you are allowed to learn by echoing. Copy what is noble until it becomes yours.
cards.storm: You’re mimicking to survive and losing yourself. Or rejecting learning because pride is loud.
cards.boundary_note: Borrow skill, not identity.
cards.key_message: Echo the good until it’s yours.

cards.title: Territory Song
cards.clear: Magpie arrives when your voice must mark your space. Not aggression—presence.
cards.storm: You’re swooping because you’re afraid. Or you’re silent while being invaded.
cards.boundary_note: Speak once, clearly.

cards.title: Laughter Cuts the Spell
cards.clear: Kookaburra teaches: truth can arrive as a laugh. The nervous system releases, and clarity appears.
cards.storm: You’re mocking to avoid pain. Or taking everything so seriously you can’t hear truth.
cards.boundary_note: Humor must free, not humiliate.

cards.title: The Season Announces Itself
cards.clear: Cicada appears when timing is non-negotiable. You can’t force the season early. Prepare, then rise.
cards.storm: You’re rushing emergence or refusing it. Either way, you miss the right song.
cards.boundary_note: Respect the season of your life.

cards.title: Return to the Pulse
cards.clear: Frog is the pulse that says: keep going.
cards.storm: You’re forcing rhythm with stimulants, stress, or chaos.
cards.boundary_note: Build rhythm that sustains.

cards.title: Song Across Distance
cards.clear: Whale appears when your truth is larger than your current shore. Long journeys. Deep memory. Sound that guides.
cards.storm: You’re longing without moving. Or moving without listening.
cards.boundary_note: Let your call guide your route.
cards.key_message: Follow the song, not the noise.

cards.title: Guard the Rare Song
cards.clear: This is the rare note that must be protected. Your gift is not for everyone.
cards.storm: You’re exposing your sacred thing to careless hands. Or hiding it so deeply it can’t live.
cards.boundary_note: Keep the sacred in the right habitat.

cards.title: The First Leap
cards.clear: Begin. Not loudly—cleanly.
cards.storm: You’re hopping to escape, not to arrive.
cards.boundary_note: Don’t leap to please.

cards.title: Small Steps, True Path
cards.clear: Wallaby teaches incremental movement—quiet competence.
cards.storm: You’re ‘busy’ with no direction.
cards.boundary_note: Direction matters more than speed.

cards.title: The Long Stride
cards.clear: Emu is endurance with purpose. Eyes forward. Keep moving.
cards.storm: You’re running from something. Or stuck because you fear distance.
cards.boundary_note: Don’t confuse speed with escape.

cards.title: Stillness as Strategy
cards.clear: Perentie teaches: stillness is strategy. Move when the opening is real.
cards.storm: You’re waiting forever because fear calls itself ‘timing.’ Or you strike too early.
cards.boundary_note: Wait for the true opening.

cards.title: The Pilgrimage
cards.clear: Turtle returns home by forces it cannot see but always trusts.
cards.storm: You’re off-course because you’re chasing surface noise.
cards.boundary_note: Don’t abandon your route for applause.

cards.title: Nourishment, Not Sedation
cards.clear: Dugong is a reminder: softness is not weakness. Move with care.
cards.storm: You’re numbing with comfort or drifting into dependency.
cards.boundary_note: Comfort must serve life, not replace it.

cards.title: Respect the Risk
cards.clear: Jellyfish appears when you must respect danger even in beauty. Timing is everything; one mistake costs.
cards.storm: You’re ignoring risk because you want the reward. Or afraid to swim at all.
cards.boundary_note: Don’t test what can ruin you.

cards.title: Attention Without Command
cards.essence: Distributed awareness touches the world lightly.
cards.clear: Oct watches the trace before it becomes story. It offers presence, not command.
cards.storm: You’re drowning in sensitivity, carrying what isn’t yours.
cards.boundary_note: Witness lightly—do not carry the whole ocean.
cards.key_message: Attention is power when it is clean.

cards.title: Silence is Strategy
cards.clear: Frogmouth teaches camouflage as wisdom: don’t announce yourself. Watch.
cards.storm: You’re hiding when you should act. Or acting to avoid being seen.
cards.boundary_note: Be unseen by choice, not by fear.

cards.title: Night Truth
cards.clear: Owl arrives when you must see what others avoid. It hunts the hidden pattern.
cards.storm: You’re obsessing over darkness or refusing to look at it.
cards.boundary_note: See clearly without becoming cruel.
cards.key_message: Look into the dark with clean eyes.

cards.title: The Long View
cards.clear: Eagle sees the whole terrain. This card appears when perspective is the medicine.
cards.storm: You’re above it to avoid feeling it. Or stuck close because you fear the view.
cards.boundary_note: Perspective must lead to action, not superiority.

cards.title: Calm Power Beneath Surface
cards.clear: This shark moves without frenzy. It teaches: be powerful without noise.
cards.storm: You’re threatening to feel safe, or shrinking to avoid conflict.
cards.boundary_note: Power is clean when it doesn’t need to prove itself.

cards.title: Grace That Filters
cards.clear: Manta teaches: take in what nourishes, let the rest pass through.
cards.storm: You’re absorbing toxicity or filtering out love.
cards.boundary_note: Filter without closing.
cards.key_message: Let only what feeds you stay.

cards.title: Ancient Calm, Bottom Truth
cards.clear: Port Jackson is the deep witness that doesn’t chase. It waits, it knows, it remains.
cards.storm: You’re stuck in the past or refusing to rise.
cards.boundary_note: Depth is not delay—unless you fear the surface.
cards.key_message: Stay deep, then rise when called.

cards.title: Star-Watched Instinct
cards.clear: Dingo listens first, then decides. It belongs by choice and walks alone by law.
cards.storm: You’re isolating to avoid trust. Or submitting because you fear being alone.
cards.boundary_note: Instinct filters deeper awareness—carry only what’s yours.

cards.title: Soft Body, Strong Defense
cards.clear: Echidna teaches: you can be gentle and still untouchable.
cards.storm: You’re spiking people because you’re hurt. Or dropping protection too soon.
cards.boundary_note: Protect tenderness without punishing closeness.

cards.title: The Lone Hunter’s Ethics
cards.clear: Quoll moves with intelligence and restraint. It chooses targets carefully—energy is sacred.
cards.storm: You’re hunting approval, not truth. Or scattering energy across too many battles.
cards.boundary_note: Spend effort only where it feeds your law.

cards.title: Survival Through Precision
cards.clear: Limits are not punishment—they are design. Live by smart limits, not grand speeches.
cards.storm: Scarcity mindset rules you, or you ignore limits and crash.
cards.boundary_note: Limits are design, not shame.

cards.title: Signal the Line
cards.clear: Blue-tongue teaches: show your boundary clearly before you need force.
cards.storm: You’re bluffing or staying silent until eruption.
cards.boundary_note: Signal early, act rarely.
cards.key_message: Show the line, then hold it.

cards.title: Joy With a Spine
cards.clear: Quokka is resilience. Keep your light without giving away your law.
cards.storm: You’re performing positivity while bleeding. Or rejecting joy because pain feels more ‘real.’
cards.boundary_note: Joy is allowed, but not as a mask.
cards.key_message: Let joy be true, not forced.

cards.title: The Small Crown
cards.clear: Dunnart is sovereignty without spectacle. Quietly crowned by endurance.
cards.storm: You’re belittling yourself, or hiding behind ‘smallness’ to avoid rising.
cards.boundary_note: You don’t need size to have law.
cards.key_message: Rule your life quietly and completely.
